sentences.sContent: We’re going to see your mother, in Toronto, Ontario.
sentences.sContent_eng: We’re going to see your mother, in Toronto, Ontario.
sentences.sCn: 我们要去安大略湖的多伦多看你的妈妈。

sentences.sContent: Outside at the head of the line, Luca and Andre Bucci of Hamilton, Ontario are almost to the door.
sentences.sContent_eng: Outside at the head of the line, Luca and Andre Bucci of Hamilton, Ontario are almost to the door.
sentences.sCn: 在队伍末的外面，来自安大略湖汉密尔顿家族的露卡和安德路`卜西甚至排到了门那了。

sentences.sContent: Considering GM's extensive operations within their borders, the governments of Canada and Ontario have agreed to do their part with an investment in GM's future, and I want to thank them for doing so.
sentences.sContent_eng: Considering GM's extensive operations within their borders, the governments of Canada and Ontario have agreed to do their part with an investment in GM's future, and I want to thank them for doing so.
sentences.sCn: 考虑到通用汽车公司在境内业务广泛，加拿大政府和安大略省政府均同意出资，为通用汽车公司的未来贡献自己的一份力量，我对此表示感谢。
